text: Kandi ntankeka mwadutumbereye muri umwe k’uwundi nkuko twabaremye ubwambere, hanyuma mwasize inyuma muvyo twabahaye, mugabo ntitubona abasavyi banyu baza kubasabira muri kumwe nabo, mugihe bavuga yuko muri basoma mbike banyu, none yamigenderanire ntikiri hagati yanyu, kandi yazimanganye hagati yanyu n’ivyo mwahora mushaka
